name: terminal-jarvis
description: AI Coding Tools Wrapper - Unified interface for claude-code, gemini-cli, qwen-code, opencode, llxprt, codex, crush, goose, amp, and aider

scripts.sync-readme-npm: npm run generate-tools && cp ../../README.md . && sed -i 's|screenshot_and_demo/|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BA-CalderonMorales/terminal-jarvis/docs/screenshots_and_demos/screenshots_and_demo/|g' README.md
scripts.copy-binary: mkdir -p bin && cp ../../target/release/terminal-jarvis bin/terminal-jarvis && chmod +x bin/terminal-jarvis
scripts.build: npm run copy-binary && npm run sync-readme-npm && npx tsc
scripts.postinstall:
node -e "console.log('
Terminal Jarvis v0.0.68 installed successfully.

Full T.JARVIS interface is ready to use.

Run: npx terminal-jarvis
')"

author: BA-CalderonMorales
